title: Remove Curse
content:
Remove Curse Level 3 Abjuration Spell Touch a creature or object to remove all Curses and Hexes affecting it. Melee Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Abjuration Spell

Touch a creature or object to remove all Curses and Hexes affecting it.

Remove Curse is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Remove Curse is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
